titleStmt.title: On the death of his excellence General Dalziel of Binns, one of the members of His Majesties most honourable Privy Council. A funeral elegie. / N. P.
titleStmt.author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Epitaph at end of sheet in Latin.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
